subject: He Establised The Rule Of Consultaion
text:
He establised the rule of consultaion,
 the most nobe of guiding principles, 
for every rightly guided leader to follow.
Consultaion is the protector of the religion 
revealed to the prophet Muhammad
 by the lord of creation.
He who seeks its support makes
 firm his rule, and he woh disdains
 it will be led astray.
